text:
jbiulder 8, change the tomcat 4.1.12 to 4.1.21, the jsp files in the sub folder 
cannot be compiled, error:

"a.jsp": Error #: 901 : package bbb.bbb stated in source C:\Documents and 
Settings\ht\jbproject\untitled1\classes\Generated 
Source\.jsp\aaa\bbb\bbb_0002fa_0002ejsp_jsp.java does not match directory bbb

not problem with 4.1.12 bringed with jbiulder 8
creator: chenhong@iro.umontreal.ca
remm@apache.org
text:
You'll have to report that bug with the Tomcat intgrator. There were issues as
to how Jasper handled paths which have been resolved, but could introduce
incompatibilities. Stick with the Tomcat which is already embedded in your
application.
